teams.name: Purdue University
teams.whereabouts: West Lafayette, Indiana, Earth, and Beyond!
teams.loan_because: As a land-grant university with a strong commitment to sustainable development around the world, we whole-heartily support efforts to help alleviate global poverty.
teams.description: The Purdue University Kiva Lending Team welcomes all students, faculty, staff, alumni and friends of Purdue University.

teams.name: Scotland
teams.loan_because: Scotland has always been a place where inventors have prospered and philanthropy has flourished. This is a chance to show that Scots do care and can make a difference in the world.
teams.description: It's a team for anyone who has links to Scotland, either through birth, marriage or simply location.

teams.name: Ireland
teams.loan_because: Small streams become mighty rivers.
teams.description: A group of Kiva Lenders from Ireland, or with links to Ireland. Feel free to join our community :)

teams.name: Condon UCC, Mission and Outreach
teams.loan_because: it's an important part of our Christian mission
teams.description: faithful people in a rural community

teams.name: Oregon friends
teams.loan_because: We loan because we can, we care and we believe in the dignity of the human spirit.
teams.description: Oregon is a very wonderful and blessed place. We can all share a little of our bounty to help everyone share and create their own garden of hope and beauty

teams.name: Beautiful Oregon State
teams.loan_because: We want to!
teams.description:
Oregon is the greatest state in the union, with sensational scenic landscapes thoughout the state.

Pictured is the Multnomah falls, where the Columbia river runs thru  the stunning Columbia Gorge

teams.name: The Heart of Oregon
teams.loan_because: For the love of ducks! Well that's one of many reasons. Oregonians are kind and compassionate people who are blessed to live in this beautiful region. We loan because it is just who we are.
teams.description: We are a community of people where everyone is a neighbor. Yes, we enjoy ducks, don't mind the rain, and on occasion might even hug a tree. But we're also not afraid to fight for what's right and help our neighbors across the sea.

teams.name: United Church of Christ
teams.loan_because: God is still speaking!
teams.description: We believe that in Jesus Christ, God has come close to us and draws us closer to each other. This is the message of the Bible, which we accept as the testimony of God's loving relationship with humanity. But because we're a very diverse community and we don't impose "tests" of the faith on anyone, there's a diversity of opinion in the UCC about what the Bible says, or how God is speaking to us through scripture, reason, tradition and experience. We believe that God has spoken, and is still speaking.

teams.name: EARTH, WIND, AND FIRE
teams.loan_because: ITS THE RIGHT THING TO DO, HELPING OTHERS
teams.description: GOD'S HELPING HANDS

teams.name: Atheists, Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists and the Non-Religious
teams.loan_because: We care about human beings and understand that it takes people to help people.
teams.description:
We are one human family, and we know that people can do good without believing in a god.

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

teams.name: Netherlands
teams.loan_because: het mensen helpt een zelfstandig bestaan op te bouwen.
teams.description: FairSpirit microkrediet promoot Kiva in Nederland. Doe jij ook mee met het FairSpirit team?

teams.name: Team USA
teams.loan_because: We believe in the generosity of the human spirit that is still alive within Americans of all backgrounds.

teams.name: Benicia, CA
teams.loan_because: Our ability to be a sustainable community is directly proportional to the sustainability of our world.
teams.description: For a few years in the 1860s the Pony Express passed through our city bringing news from the East to the West. Today, we want to participate in bringing news from the West to the World. We are choosing to change and start our planet on a new journey. The journey of life, the journey of love.

teams.name: Team Obama
teams.loan_because: We understand that our combined efforts through Kiva will help make this world a much better place!
teams.description: http://www.npr.org/templates/story/story.php?storyId=127545645

teams.name: Artists For Change
teams.loan_because: we can.
teams.description: A group of artists of all disciplines who believe we can make a difference.

teams.name: Team Kansas City
teams.loan_because: We love the idea of empowering other people to help themselves.
teams.description: We are proud residents of a wonderful town.

teams.name: GLBT (Gay, Lesbian, Bisexual, Transgender) Kivans & Friends
teams.loan_because: We are out and proud and know what it is like to face barriers. We are privileged to help our entrepreneurs achieve their own equality. We thank our friends who join us in our loans & in supporting GLBT rights.
teams.description: We are gay, lesbian, bisexual, transgender, homosexual, and heterosexual people from all over the world.

teams.name: Traders & Investors
teams.loan_because:
...
We want to help increase the prosperity, security and happiness of as many people as we can.

The free enterprise system grows not only by indirectly loaning capital to corporations by buying their stock but also by directly giving loans to people who want to passionately grow their own business.
teams.description: We are a worldwide team of traders, investors and speculators who by their honest support of both The Global Stock Market System and The Global Free Enterprise System hope to increase the prosperity, security and happiness of as many people as we can.

teams.name: Fairtrade-supporters
teams.loan_because:
We believe in empowering people with better trade conditions, work conditions and are convinced that people themselves can pull out of poverty under proper circumstances.

The loans made in this team are not necessarily made to fair trade businesses although it's encouraged.
teams.description: Fairtrade certification is the world's largest product certification for better working conditions.

teams.name: Poverty2Prosperity.org - Poverty-Escape
teams.loan_because: Poverty2Prosperity.org (P2P) is all about Poverty-Escape. Please join our fun team and put Poverty-Escape in the lead!  See how to get your I'm a Kiva Loaner Bracelet and more by participating on Team P2P - visit our web site for details!
teams.description:
One of P2P's major poverty-escaping projects is to participate in making microloans through the Kiva platform. See the web site for details on all of our projects. Also see our Perpetual Fund lender account which allows people to designate funds for perpetual loaning here on Kiva, http://www.kiva.org/lender/P2PPerpetualFund

We have a special purpose fund to keep loans from expiring. Please join us at http://poverty2prosperity.org/sosloans to see currently funding loans from the SOS Loan fund.

NOTE:  Poverty2Prosperity is also a non-profit, and any messages not related to Kiva or Poverty2Prosperity may be deleted.  If there is an idea you would like to share, contact one of the Team Captains to get permission.  Thank you for your consideration.

teams.name: Finland
teams.description: Kiva Loaners in Finland

teams.name: Ubuntu
teams.loan_because: Ubuntu: 1) An ancient African word meaning 'humanity to others' or 'I am what I am because of who we all are'.
teams.description:
Ubuntu: 2) A Linux based operating system that powers desktops, servers, netbooks and laptops; bringing the spirit of Ubuntu to the world of computers.

This is a team for the Ubuntu Linux community to show our support of microcredit and Ubuntu.

teams.name: GNU/Linux and Free Software
teams.loan_because: Microcredit and free software - both revolutionizing ideas, and great tools to bring power and opportunities to those who need it the most.
teams.description: We are here because we want to give people opportunities - and spread the word about free software that belongs to everybody.

teams.name: Pittsburgh
teams.loan_because: Pittsburghers understand hard work. We support the idea of opportunity for all people.
teams.description:
The Kiva Pittsburgh team is made up of progressive Pittsburgh natives, transplants and others who love the city. We look forward to hosting events for current Kiva loaners and those interested in Kiva.

We come together to make a change in our world.

Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/KivaPittsburgh

Check us out on Facebook:
www.facebook.com/KivaPittsburgh

teams.name: Church of the Flying Spaghetti Monster
teams.loan_because:
"Thou shalt share, that none may seek without funding."   A nod to VII.  of “RANDOM NUMBER OF NOT COMMANDMENTS, SUGGESTIONS"  in the LOOSE CANON:
http://www.loose-canon.info/page17.htm
teams.description:
Members of the Church of the Flying Spaghetti Monster  

Secular vs religious Field Partners, see links at http://atheist-monkey.blogspot.de/2009/08/kiva-mfi-checker.html

For Kiva tips and who knows what the FSM will move us to add for mutual benefit & merriment:  
http://flyingspaghettikivans.blogspot.it/    

and
  https://www.facebook.com/pages/FlyingSpaghettiKivans

teams.name: Cheeseheads For Change
teams.loan_because: If you give a man a fish, you feed him for a day.  Now in the modern world, you can give that same man a loan to buy a fishing pole, he catches fish with his new pole to feed his family, his community improves because of his financial success, he pays the loan back, and  you can re-loan that money again to help someone else buy a fishing pole . . . wait, that sounds like a conspiracy by the Rapala Corporation to sell more fishing equipment, what are we supporting here ;-)
teams.description: Our Kiva lending team is a non-political group consisting of Green Bay Packers fans lovingly known as Cheeseheads, and anyone who lives in or has ties to the great state of Wisconsin and is interested in making the world a better place.

teams.name: Malama Ohana
teams.loan_because: we believe in the global family.  We support entrepreneurs whose vision is that of contributing to creating a world of abundance.
teams.description: We are an Ohana (family) of Hawaiians and Hawaiians at heart who believe in extending our family and making an impact in eliminating global poverty through entrepreneurship.  We support microfinancing projects, micro-lending, and peer-to-peer lending.

teams.name: Bethel Lutheran
teams.loan_because: Our mission is to connect people to Jesus Christ. We are the hands, feet, eyes and ear and body of Christ in the world.
teams.description: a community gathered of Lutheran Christians

teams.name: Lutherans for Palestine
teams.loan_because: God calls us to bring justice into the world, even one person at a time.
teams.description: Lutherans from around the world with a love and passion for the Holy Land and the plight of the Palestinian people

teams.name: Animal Lovers
teams.loan_because: Even as animals living in a developed country - we are better off  than humans in many parts of the world.
teams.description: We are animal lovers who want to help those less fortunate in the poor areas of the world.

teams.loan_because:
Join today and make a loan for a chance to win!

We want to help individuals move towards an improved life for themselves, their families and their communities.
teams.description: We are Chevron employees, families and friends who care about the well being of people in our communities.

teams.name: Vegetarians and Vegans on Kiva
teams.loan_because: We have a vision of a healthier, more compassionate and sustainable world. Hard work is often not enough to escape poverty and we gladly welcome the opportunity to give people and their businesses a fighting chance. Our team focus is on making loans to borrowers who don't use animals in their businesses.
teams.description: We're vegetarians and vegans, and those thinking about making the change.  We welcome everyone regardless of their motivation for going veggie.

teams.name: Yale University
teams.loan_because: Because we can...
teams.description: Help through education...

teams.name: Kiva Muslims
teams.loan_because:
002.271 Yusuf Ali Translation:
If ye disclose (acts of) charity, even so it is well, but if ye conceal them, and make them reach those (really) in need, that is best for you: It will remove from you some of your (stains of) evil. And Allah is well acquainted with what ye do.
teams.description: Insha'Allah our team will be a collaboration of people from all walks of life united by one goal: to help those less fortunate and displaying great appreciation to our creator for blessing us to help make a differerence in the world.

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising
teams.description: We're Canadian, eh?

teams.name: Michiganders
teams.loan_because: We believe in the power of micro lending.
teams.description: A group of individuals that share a common geographic location and are passionate about what the future holds for micro lending.

teams.loan_because: We understand that our combined efforts through Kiva will help make this world a much better place!
teams.description: http://www.npr.org/templates/story/story.php?storyId=127545645

teams.name: Team Puggle
teams.loan_because: Puggles want to give back, too... they just don't have thumbs to work the keyboard, so we help.
teams.description:
Puggles are an intentional cross breed between a pug & a beagle. They are awesome companions.  

We advocate responcible pet ownership.... NEVER buy a dog from a pet store....  Getting your next best friend from the shelter or a responcible breeder is one of the first steps in being a good pet owner.

teams.name: KivaFriends.org
teams.loan_because: we are a diverse group of people with diverse reasons for participating on Kiva.org, but with a unifying desire to alleviate poverty around the world through making microloans to the hard working poor.
teams.description: We are a community for lenders by lenders. We welcome Kiva.org lenders to participate in our lender forums at KivaFriends.org

teams.name: Berlin
teams.loan_because: it feels right.
teams.description: We are people from or connected with Berlin, Germany's most beautiful city and capital, who have been lucky enough to discover Kiva.

teams.name: Crazy Canucks
teams.loan_because: We live in a well-to-do nation and want to help those less fortunate than ourselves
teams.description: We are CANADIAN !!!

teams.name: Kiva Detroit
teams.loan_because: We want to champion small businesses in Detroit!
teams.description:
Kiva Detroit is the first Kiva City, a program where Kiva works with community organizations in the United States to provide local small businesses with microloans. 

The goal of the Kiva Detroit team is to empower Detroiters to champion local small businesses through Kiva. 

To double your impact, your loan to a Kiva Detroit borrower will be matched 1-to-1 by the Knight Foundation

teams.name: We for Humanity
teams.loan_because: We as a people care for our fellow human beings.
teams.description: We do not adhere to  the social constructs that we as a human race have developed in order to categorize each other.  If you are a person in need; your spiritual beliefs, geographical location, age, gender,  and political association is of no interest to us.

teams.name: ZEITGEIST lenders
teams.loan_because: it is the ZEITGEIST to facilitate entrepreneurship.

teams.name: Kiva City
teams.loan_because: We support small business owners in the United States.
teams.description:
We support small businesses and want to do more to bring Kiva to cities in the U.S.

If you are interested in loaning to small business owners in the U.S. or if you want to help bring Kiva to your city, this team is a community to expand the reach of Kiva in America.

teams.name: Texas
teams.loan_because: Texas does it bigger!

teams.name: Washington State

teams.name: Team Austin
teams.loan_because: Kiva, and the groups Kiva works with, are enabling people to improve their lives and the lives of other people in their community. Who wouldn't want to be a part of that!
teams.description: Our team is made up of people living in Austin, Tx. The people in Austin work in many jobs and professions. Our active interests in music, health, education, technology, science and the arts is something we all share. We value those people who have the courage to value creative people who are different from them (weird). Our unofficial city motto is "KEEP AUSTIN WEIRD." ;)

teams.name: Norway
teams.loan_because:
We have Cold Weather - Warm hearts !
We believe that providing microloans to entrepreneurs in developing countries is the socially responsive way of helping people break the circle of poverty. 

We promote Kiva.org as a sustainable and transparent way of connecting lenders and borrowers from across the globe.
teams.description:
Bruk denne linken for å invitere dine venner til teamet her:
http://www.kiva.org/team/norway/recruit

Det er flott hvis du trykker Facebook "anbefale/recommend" knappen oppe til høyre  på denne siden. Vår facebookgruppe: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Kiva-Norway/193432017389484

Anbefalte lån "sikrere" lån: 
http://www.kiva.org/lend?sortBy=partner_default_min=0&partner_default_max=0.5&partner_risk_rating_min=1&partner_risk_rating_max=5&partner_arrears_min=0&partner_arrears_max=1.1&sortBy=repaymentTerm
Hjelp med "expiring loans": http://poverty2prosperity.org/sosloans/#fundraising_loans

Hjelp med "postdisbursed" lån:
http://kivatools.com/fundraising/postdisbursedloans

Kiva tools:
https://www.kiva.org/portfolio/collections
http://www.bhodisoft.com/kiva-country-collector/
http://www.bhodisoft.com/kfpc/
http://www.kivalens.org

Da har vi nådd målet på 2 million dollar utlånt. Takk til alle som har bidratt!

teams.name: Portugal
teams.loan_because:
Honramos o legado deixado pelos nossos antepassados que espalharam cultura, conhecimento e valores por todo o mundo. Onde há um português, há um amigo pronto a ajudar e dar esperança aos que mais precisam. Isto é Portugal.
~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~
We honor the legacy of our ancestors who spread our culture, knowledge and values around the world. Wherever there is a Portuguese, there is a friend willing to help and give hope to those in need. This is Portugal.
teams.description: Portuguese Lenders Team

teams.name: Porto
teams.loan_because: We loan because we must…
teams.description: Loaners Team from Porto - Portugal

teams.name: Friends of Bob Harris
teams.loan_because:
After stumbling into a job as a luxury travel writer, I saw so much poverty that I decided to turn those paychecks into Kiva loans. Then I visited a bunch of clients, who were amazing, and I've written a book about it called "The International Bank of Bob" (Walker/Bloomsbury, March 5, 2013).

I hope the book will get more people to feel a greater understanding of Kiva, a better appreciation of the role of microfinance, and most of all, more connected to the rest of the world.
teams.description: People who realize that if we switched places with the recipients, they'd loan to us just as happily.  So, fair's fair.

teams.name: Texas
teams.loan_because: Texas does it bigger!

teams.name: RPCVs for Kiva - Returned Peace Corps Volunteers
teams.loan_because: we want to continue our service after returning from the Peace Corps

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising

~Mother Theresa
teams.description: A crazy quartet trying to do little things with great love!

teams.name: Cheeseheads For Change
teams.loan_because: If you give a man a fish, you feed him for a day.  Now in the modern world, you can give that same man a loan to buy a fishing pole, he catches fish with his new pole to feed his family, his community improves because of his financial success, he pays the loan back, and  you can re-loan that money again to help someone else buy a fishing pole . . . wait, that sounds like a conspiracy by the Rapala Corporation to sell more fishing equipment, what are we supporting here ;-)
teams.description: Our Kiva lending team is a non-political group consisting of Green Bay Packers fans lovingly known as Cheeseheads, and anyone who lives in or has ties to the great state of Wisconsin and is interested in making the world a better place.

We want to help.
Nous voulons aider.
teams.description:
The political status of Québec is a province within the country of Canada (although a portion of the population would prefer Québec to become sovereign in the future).  The Parliament of Canada has recognized the Québécois as a nation. The largest city in Québec is Montréal, and the capital is also called Québec (Quebec City). The official language of Québec is French.

If you'd like to come and visit us, the official tourism site of the Québec government is at http://www.bonjourquebec.com

teams.name: Three Cups of Tea - CAI Supporters
teams.loan_because: we have been touched, moved, inspired, and motivated by the example of Greg Mortenson, humanitarian, peace-maker, and author of "Three Cups of Tea: One Man's Mission To Promote Peace... One School At A Time."  Please read it if you have not already done so: your life will be changed.  We also support the Central Asia Institute (CAI), and Pennies For Peace (www.penniesforpeace.org)
teams.description: We lend especially to women in Pakistan and Afghanistan, where Mortenson and CAI are active in establishing community schools in rural areas.

teams.name: HP
teams.loan_because:
This is a unique opportunity for HP employees globally to actively participate in driving HP Living Progress by supporting thousands of entrepreneurs around the world who need access to capital to start or grow their business. HP Living Progress is the framework for how we do business. It’s how we use our people and technologies to create a world where everyone has the opportunity to progress. 

Through this innovative collaboration with Kiva and the HP Company Foundation we can help ensure that entrepreneurs around the world achieve their dreams.
teams.description: Our team is committed to changing a million lives, and helping to end extreme poverty, one loan at a time.

teams.name: New England
teams.loan_because: We care and want to share in your success.
teams.description: New Englanders have a history of being self sufficient and independent as well as exhibiting pride in their individual state's heritage, yet they are bound together by their unique geography and history. It is the smallest region in the continental United States which is not blessed with large farmable land or a mild climate, but  it has played a dominant role in the cultural and  economic development of America. Our New England Team members would like to pass along these gifts to others willing to work hard to benefit their own local communities with their skills and intiative.

teams.loan_because: by lending, we can make a difference!
teams.description: People who live in or near or are associated with the great City of Pittsburgh!  Or those who would like to be, but aren't! teams.name: Indiana
teams.loan_because: We believe people around the world are connected and we can make a positive difference in others' lives.
teams.description:
Indiana is the 19th U.S. state and is located in the Midwest region of the United States of America. With over six million residents, it is ranked 15th in population and 17th in population density.

Indiana is a diverse state with a few large urban areas and a number of smaller industrial cities. It is best known for the Indianapolis 500 American automobile race, held annually over the Memorial Day weekend, and a strong basketball tradition, often called Hoosier Hysteria. Residents of Indiana are called Hoosiers. The state's name means "Land of the Indians."

Check out the distribution of our team's impact around the world: 
http://kivafolio.appspot.com/report?user=indiana

To see a map showing where Indiana team members are located, click the link below.

teams.loan_because: We understand that our combined efforts through Kiva will help make this world a much better place!
teams.description: http://www.npr.org/templates/story/story.php?storyId=127545645

teams.name: New York
teams.loan_because: New York is full of entrepreneurs so we want to support others around the world, and give them the opportunity to alleviate themselves out of poverty.
teams.description:

Please note, Team Message unrelated to Kiva New York team lending & activities may be deleted.  Please keep posts related to the team!

http://gplus.to/kivany

teams.name: Entrepreneurs & Business Owners
teams.loan_because: We have a passion for seeing other people succeed and helping them to achieve total freedom and success in business.
teams.description: We are a group of entrepreneurs, business owners, and leaders who take action to change our life and the life of others.

teams.name: LOTUS: Lend Out To Uplift Self-sufficiency
teams.loan_because: We care about people striving to enhance their economic self-sufficiency and wish to support their entrepreneurial endeavors. It just takes one small step by each of us lending on kiva. Together we can make it easier for hard working people to get the much-needed capital to sustain and grow their business. We feel blessed to be able to support the aspirations of so many loan recipients who persevere tenaciously for a better quality of life with dignity. Kudos to Kiva.org that allows us to connect for this common cause.
teams.description:
In our team, we have a vision to change lives in novel ways. Our team's origin began with a Kiva Card (gift certificate) whose recipient founded this team. Inspired by Kiva Fellow, Jessica Heinzelman's talk, our founder dreamed to take us on a cruise, beyond the realm of lending targets and team statistics. Frequent & occasional lenders are free to choose who to lend to, how much and when in an amiable team ambience nurtured by Kiva Fellows, Kiva Editor & Translators, artists, writers, entrepreneurs, workers, retired people, families, parent + kid(s), students, teachers, and professionals. Our diversity & portfolio enable our discovery of social values inherent in the Kiva micro-lending ecosystem whose issues we debate objectively. Experienced members are gratified to enhance our grasp of nuances in lending. We wish to work with volunteers in the team, Kiva Friends, http://kivafriends.org and our supporters to engage in activities that promote Kiva. Our journey to strengthen and grow the Kiva ecosystem has room for more. JOIN NOW, and check out our team, to convince yourself that it can be your team too.

LINKS TO SEE ALSO:
1. Kiva Updates:http://www.kiva.org/updates/kiva 
2. KF Blogs:http://www.kiva.org/updates/fellows 

(Thanks Anh D Pham for letting LOTUS team on Kiva to use the exquisite image of the lotus flower you photographed in Vietnam)

teams.name: Kiva Austin Texas
teams.loan_because: We are big-hearted Texans and citizens of the world who enjoy sharing our prosperity and making a positive difference in the world.
teams.description:
a delightfully diverse group of Austinites. Be proud, Team Austin--our Kiva team is second only to NYC (with nearly 4X as many members!) for total lending for a city team. 
And a hearty WELCOME!! to all our new members.

teams.name: LOTUS: Lend Out To Uplift Self-sufficiency
teams.loan_because: We care about people striving to enhance their economic self-sufficiency and wish to support their entrepreneurial endeavors. It just takes one small step by each of us lending on kiva. Together we can make it easier for hard working people to get the much-needed capital to sustain and grow their business. We feel blessed to be able to support the aspirations of so many loan recipients who persevere tenaciously for a better quality of life with dignity. Kudos to Kiva.org that allows us to connect for this common cause.
teams.description:
In our team, we have a vision to change lives in novel ways. Our team's origin began with a Kiva Card (gift certificate) whose recipient founded this team. Inspired by Kiva Fellow, Jessica Heinzelman's talk, our founder dreamed to take us on a cruise, beyond the realm of lending targets and team statistics. Frequent & occasional lenders are free to choose who to lend to, how much and when in an amiable team ambience nurtured by Kiva Fellows, Kiva Editor & Translators, artists, writers, entrepreneurs, workers, retired people, families, parent + kid(s), students, teachers, and professionals. Our diversity & portfolio enable our discovery of social values inherent in the Kiva micro-lending ecosystem whose issues we debate objectively. Experienced members are gratified to enhance our grasp of nuances in lending. We wish to work with volunteers in the team, Kiva Friends, http://kivafriends.org and our supporters to engage in activities that promote Kiva. Our journey to strengthen and grow the Kiva ecosystem has room for more. JOIN NOW, and check out our team, to convince yourself that it can be your team too.

LINKS TO SEE ALSO:
1. Kiva Updates:http://www.kiva.org/updates/kiva 
2. KF Blogs:http://www.kiva.org/updates/fellows 

(Thanks Anh D Pham for letting LOTUS team on Kiva to use the exquisite image of the lotus flower you photographed in Vietnam)

teams.name: University of Wisconsin-Madison
teams.loan_because: We believe we can make a change in this world.
teams.description: Students, staff, faculty, and alumni of University of Wisconsin-Madison get together to participate in microfinancing.  We are very enthusiastic about it.

teams.name: Guys holding fish
teams.loan_because: We feel an affinity for entrepreneurs that make their living by fishing, selling fish, or attempting to make their lives better because of their proximity to the ocean, or freshwater locales...
teams.description:
We love fish and/or fishing so much that many of us have chosen to present ourselves on KIVA with a photo of ourselves, holding a fish!  We welcome "gals" to join, as well, the name of the team notwithstanding...  

We certainly support "sustainable" fishing, but also recognize that sometimes, our "Western" views of resource management may not match the needs of the very desperate folks, in other countries, struggling to make a living, or even providing food for their families ...  Our intent is to help the struggling, without regard to their profession or trade.  We believe that our lending record well represents that goal, as we are a pretty diverse group, with very diverse lending interests....
